Html:
I'm basing an app on the patterns demonstrated in Prism. But I also need to authenticate users, grant/deny permission to perform certain tasks depending what role they are assigned, logging of who did what, etc

I know Prism isn't intended to demonstrate this functionality, but where can I find guidance or pattern on how to add this type of role based security & logging to an app based on the WPF/Prism model? Is there an example anywhere of how to add this to WPF/Prism?

Hi,

You might find the following threads useful to your purpose, as they show some suggestions or clues on how to fulfill your requirement in Prism:

  • How to create the optimal infrastructure?
  • Dynamic Module Catalog?
  • How to track state of the models?
  • Entity composed entirely of compex types - Not available to bootstrapper

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
